lead_paragraph: A headline on Tuesday with an article about last-minute signings by major league baseball draft picks referred incorrectly in some copies to the deal between pitcher Stephen Strasburg and the Washington Nationals. As the article noted, he agreed to a reported four-year, $15.1 million deal, a record package that includes a $7.5 million signing bonus — not a “record $15 million bonus.”.
